text:
*Job Description: High-Skilled Flutter Developer Needed*
We are seeking an experienced Flutter developer to work on a mobile app project. The developer will be responsible for building the frontend based on a provided Figma design and integrating APIs into the app. This is a full-time(fixed budget), 1-month project with a focus on delivering high-quality and efficient results.
*Key Responsibilities:*
• Build responsive and pixel-perfect Flutter frontend based on the provided Figma design.
• Integrate APIs seamlessly into the app’s pages to ensure full functionality.
• Collaborate closely with the team to ensure the app meets project specifications and deadlines.
• Debug, test, and optimize the app to ensure smooth performance.
*Requirements:*
• Proven experience in Flutter development with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
• Expertise in building frontend layouts and integrating RESTful APIs.
• Familiarity with mobile app development best practices, including responsiveness and performance optimization.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Strong communication skills to work effectively with the team.
• Availability to work full-time and deliver the project within 1 month.
*Preferred Locations:*
• Vietnam or India.
*How to Apply:*
If you meet the above requirements and are excited to work on this project, please send your resume, portfolio, and your expected rate. We look forward to hearing from talented developers who can bring our vision to life.

Hi everyone!

I'm a 7x Certified Salesforce Marketing Cloud expert, available up to 25 hours a week at a budget-friendly rate of $29/hr.

I specialize in:
:white_check_mark:  Data import/export, segmentation, and automation.
:white_check_mark: Personalized journeys via email, SMS, WhatsApp, and custom activities.
:white_check_mark: Responsive emails compatible with Outlook, Gmail, and Apple Mail.
:white_check_mark: Custom preference centers with SSJS and AMPScript.
:white_check_mark: REST/SOAP API integrations with Marketing Cloud and third-party platforms.

Let’s connect and create something amazing together!
